mapper.select: SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_PID, MENU_NAME, IF(MENU_URL IS NULL, '', MENU_URL) MENU_URL, MENU_LEVEL, IF(MENU_TYPE='folder', TRUE, FALSE) MENU_PARENT, IF(MENU_LEVEL=0, TRUE, IF(MENU_LEVEL=1, TRUE, FALSE)) MENU_OPEN, MENU_VALID FROM SYS_MENU WHERE MENU_PID=#{0} ORDER BY MENU_LEVEL, MENU_INDEX

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_PID, MENU_NAME, IF(MENU_URL IS NULL, '', MENU_URL) MENU_URL, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_INDEX, IF(MENU_TYPE='folder', TRUE, FALSE) MENU_PARENT, IF(MENU_LEVEL=0, TRUE, IF(MENU_LEVEL=1, TRUE, FALSE)) MENU_OPEN, TRUE MENU_CHECKED, MENU_VALID FROM SYS_MENU WHERE MENU_ID IN (SELECT MENU_ID FROM ROLE_MENU_REL WHERE ROLE_ID = #{roleId}) UNION SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_PID, MENU_NAME, IF(MENU_URL IS NULL, '', MENU_URL) MENU_URL, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_INDEX, IF(MENU_TYPE='folder', TRUE, FALSE) MENU_PARENT, IF(MENU_LEVEL=0, TRUE, IF(MENU_LEVEL=1, TRUE, FALSE)) MENU_OPEN, FALSE MENU_CHECKED, MENU_VALID FROM SYS_MENU WHERE MENU_ID NOT IN (SELECT MENU_ID FROM ROLE_MENU_REL WHERE ROLE_ID = #{roleId}) ) T WHERE T.MENU_PID = #{menuId} ORDER BY T.MENU_LEVEL, T.MENU_INDEX
UPDATE SYS_MENU SET MENU_TYPE=#{menuType} WHERE MENU_ID=#{menuId}
